title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Kasu Mala - The Kalyan Collection
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Traditional Kasu (coin) inspired long necklace with interspersed floral motifs, embellished with dazzling diamonds. The pendant features a large emerald centerpiece surrounded by intricate diamond work. Filigree detailing adds a touch of old-world charm. The design features a graduated coin arrangement, a modern twist on the traditional Kasu Mala.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies. An ideal gift for brides (Vadhuvu) and makes a statement piece for special occasions like Seemantham and Upanayanam.
description: This Kalyan Collection piece blends tradition with modern aesthetics. It's a timeless investment that retains cultural significance. The use of high-quality emeralds and brilliant diamonds ensures lasting beauty. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring superior craftsmanship and unique design. The long haaram style offers versatility for styling with various outfits.
